name: FANCY FOOD AND MORE
description: Hey, welcome to Ha Noi. I always wanna be a chef so I love cuisine so much. I will show you the food tour around Ha Noi with the special food, the story behind each stunning dish and if you want, i will teach you how to cook! And I can be sure with you that is an amazing journey! Wanna join with me? We can discover the city on my motorbike and any vehicle you want like bus, cyclo or just walk around the old quarter.You will be happy with your decision.
